description:
The Minecraft video game franchise reached a new level of popularity with the release of A Minecraft Movie. The movie has appealed to audiences that have been playing the game for years and kids that are just beginning to get into the franchise. As such, there is plenty of room for a sequel, and it [...]

The post ‘A Minecraft Movie’ Sequel Already Being Discussed appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: ‘A Minecraft Movie’ Sequel Already Being Discussed
